EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - Information Evening Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
NCS Information Evening
Dear Parent/Guardian of {!Contact.Name} and {!Contact.FirstName},
Your NCS programme is fast approaching! Before it starts, you are both invited to a short information evening about the programme. Here you will have the opportunity to meet other participants and parents/guardians, and to ask us any questions you may have. {!Wave_Selection__c.Girl_only_wave_prog_email_sentence__c} The details are as follows:
Date: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Date__c} Time: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_time__c} Address: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_venue_and_address__c} {!Wave__c.Info_eve_additional_info__c}
The evening will last approximately 1 hour, with a short presentation starting within the first 15 minutes. Please arrive promptly so we can start on time.
Please confirm your attendance by emailing {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_SC_email_address__c} or by calling {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_mobile_number__c}.
This event is for parents/guardians and participants, but if you want to bring a friend who may be interested in NCS, please just let us know when confirming your attendance. We would be happy to meet them and discuss the likelihood of them getting a place.
We hope to see you at the information evening.
Yours sincerely,
{!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c} The Challenge
